mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT post_id, post_time, post_title, post_content, post_delete, cate_id, mem_id, REF, re_step, re_level FROM post WHERE cate_id = #{cate_id} ORDER BY REF DESC, re_step ASC ) a ) where rn >= (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 and rn <= #{page}*#{pageSize}
select count(*) from post where cate_id=#{cate_id} and post_delete='no'
mapper.update: update post set post_delete='yes' where post_id=#{post_id}
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM( SELECT P.post_id ,P.cate_id, P.mem_id ,NVL(post_par, 0) post_par ,LPAD('└▶', (LEVEL-1)*4) || P.post_nm post_nm ,post_cont ,post_time ,post_del ,post_group ,LEVEL FROM POST P WHERE cate_id=#{cate_id} START WITH P.post_par IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR P.post_id = P.post_par ORDER SIBLINGS BY P.post_group DESC, P.post_id ) A ) B WHERE B.RN >= ( #{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND B.RN <= #{page} * #{pageSize}
select count(*) from post where cate_id=#{cate_id} and post_del='N'
update post set post_nm=#{post_nm},post_cont=#{post_cont} where post_id = #{post_id}
mapper.update: update post set post_del='Y' where post_id=#{post_id}
